'''Otogi "Kintake" Courtyard Gate''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Otogi "Kintake" Courtyard Gate is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest east of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Chirai Shrine]] on Tsurumi Island.
<gallery>
Item Otogi Kintake Courtyard Gate Location.png|Map location
Item Otogi Kintake Courtyard Gate Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=30}}.
{{Recipe

|time = 12h
|Otogi Wood = 8
}}
